Description:
Factory conversion elegance, park-edge position
Built behind the parapet of the heritage Spicer factory building, this impressive apartment in a well-maintained complex of only 13 offers secure and private living bordering hectares of Yarra parkland and bike trails, and close to Clifton Hill station, cafes and freeway access. Opening to a northerly terrace, it comprises 2 double bedrooms (BIRs, ensuite to main), a spacious living/dining room, stylish Smeg-equipped kitchen and a good-sized bathroom/laundry with walk-in shower. Including basement parking and a storage cage, this immaculate city-edge home features polished timber floors, split-system air conditioning and intercom entry.
Insights: 11/165 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Boutique Warehouse Style Residence
In a coveted boutique residence (1 of only 7) with sleek, neutral tones throughout, this exceptional and light-filled warehouse styled apartment boasts a generously proportioned interior that will appeal to professional couples, astute investors and young families looking to secure a highly sought slice of the inner city. Personifying the low-maintenance, contemporary lifestyle, the home comprises 3 bedrooms with BIRs (2 with balcony, main with WIR, ensuite and study area), an expansive open plan living and dining level with gleaming timber floors that opens through concertina doors onto the north-facing outdoor entertaining area, impressive designer kitchen (stone bench tops, coffee machine), central bathroom with separate bathtub, separate laundry, powder room and storage. Located in a highly sought position surrounded by parklands (Darling Gardens, Ramsden Street Reserve, Merri Creek Trail), the home enjoys easy access to Clifton Hill Station, Eastern Freeway, great schools and the many fine cafes the inner north is known for. Features include heating/cooling, generous storage, secure intercom entrance and 2 x secure OSP.
Insights: 5/94 Roseneath Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2013 and 3 other 3 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Quintessential Grand Victorian, Idyllic Family Lifestyle
With a commanding street presence behind its wrought iron fence, original latticework and tessellated tile entrance, this classic tuck-pointed brick Victorian will be presented to the market for the first time in over 50 years. Enjoying the preferred northerly-rear orientation and an idyllic family lifestyle with Darling Gardens at the end of the street, the immaculately presented home comprises an imposing hallway entrance, 3 bedrooms (2 x BIRs), an expansive formal sitting room or flexible 4th bedroom, formal dining area, informal living room with adjacent dining area serviced by the large modern kitchen (industrial oven and gas cook top, ample storage) that overlooks the sun-drenched northeast-facing sunroom/reading area which opens onto the tremendous rear garden with iconic lemon tree and 2 x OSP via ROW, central bathroom with claw-foot bathtub and separate laundry. Exuding period elegance throughout, the interior boasts high ceilings with ornate roses, Baltic Pine floors, marble OFPs, decorative leadlight glass and sash windows and is conveniently located within close proximity to Queens Parade shops/cafes/trams, Clifton Hill train station, Merri Creek Trail leading to Westgarth Village and many fine schools including St John's Primary.
Insights: 126 Hodgkinson Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Family classic on a big Berry Street corner block
Double-fronted, solid brick and set on the corner of Caroline Street, this long-held 4 bedroom family home resonates with original appeal and outstanding potential at the heart of the Clifton Hill Village. Retaining its superbly maintained period integrity throughout a large proportioned interior, this classic Federation home on 368 sq. metres (approx.) with rear ROW extends a rare invitation to be the best on Berry Street near cafes, shops, schools, Quarries Park and train station. Comfortable as is with desirable size and scope to stylishly renovate and extend (STCA); includes fretted hallway, north-facing living room, family/meals adjoining kitchen, bathroom, laundry, gas heating, open fireplaces, high ceiling roses, sun-filled and spacious rear garden, shed and lock-up garage.
Insights: 12 Berry Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Inner-City Town Residence
SOLD by Miles Real Estate. Inner city convenience enjoys a distinctly village vibe in this sophisticated split level town residence positioned just a short walk from gorgeous Clifton Hill Village, Queens Parade shopping, Darling Gardens and Clifton Hill Station. Enhanced by the peace and privacy of its own street entry, smartly presented proportions rise up to a top floor kitchen with Blanco appliances, living and entertaining space and a wonderful alfresco terrace ensure outstanding indoor/ outdoor entertaining flexibility within a dynamic city edge setting. Two spacious double bedrooms with built in robes / storage share a stylish family bathroom with both bath and separate shower. Includes ducted reverse cycle heating/cooling, secure 2 car garage parking with internal access. Only minutes to the CBD, Collingwood Leisure Centre, acres of parkland and Merri Creek walking trails plus a myriad of renowned inner city attractions.
Insights: 5 Heidelberg Road, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Exceptional space, park gateway position
This unusually spacious residence, maximising light and space, is superbly designed for low-maintenance city-edge living. On its own title, it borders hectares of Yarra parkland and playing fields with access to bike paths, and is within easy walking distance to Village cafes and station. With high ceilings, generous principal rooms and quality fittings, this light-filled residence opens to a wide hallway and central atrium area. It incorporates a main bedroom/retreat with balcony, plus 2 further double bedrooms (BIRs); superbly proportioned living/dining room flowing to a landscaped courtyard and 2-car off street parking from Clifford Place. A well-zoned floor plan incorporates solid timber kitchen (Smeg appliances, granite benchtops); 3 marble-tiled bathrooms and euro laundry. With balcony views to the CBD, the home features Sydney blue gum floors floors, split-system air conditioning, alarm and ample storage. [No owners' corporation]
Insights: 24 Yambla Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Fit for a Family
If you have been searching for an affordably family size home in the inner city your search may be over. With 3 bedrooms, 2 living areas, a bathroom, kitchen and generous garden with car access via a ROW. Brilliantly located in the heart of Clifton Hill these double fronted properties rarely come to market so inspection is a must
Insights: 367 Wellington Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand new contemporary living with stamp duty savings
Brand new architect designed residence currently under construction offers a carefully considered low maintenance living environment in this popular lifestyle location. Offering a superior level of design & finish PLUS STAMP DUTY SAVINGS, this quality contemporary inner city property will appeal to both astute owner occupiers and savvy investors alike. The versatile floorplan includes 2 large bedrooms (master with private deck, both with built in robes), central bathroom with bath & separate toilet, front sitting/tv room/guest room, modern gourmet kitchen with Caesarstone benchtops & built in fridge, laundry (built in washer/dryer), spacious open plan living & dining zones flowing to a private rear yard with easy off street parking via roller door (ROW). Other features include: study nook (under the stairs), powder room, heating & cooling, quality fittings & finishes throughout. Enquire now and enjoy the STAMP DUTY SAVINGS that this property offers as well as a wonderful lifestyle opportunity. For a complete schedule of fixtures, fittings & finishes and/or architectural drawings - please contact us to discuss further. Private Sale $1,050,000. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd.
Insights: 8 Peckville Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Delightful Cottage In Idyllic Position
Behind an inviting front garden with Weeping Silver Birch tree and rose bush, this delightful home retains its period lustre boasting a timeless Edwardian façade, leadlight windows, Baltic Pine floors, OFPs in each room and high, decorative ceilings. Resting in a quiet, family oriented street, the home comprises 2 bedrooms (one with BIRs), formal living room, modern kitchen with quality appliances and ample storage overlooking the light-filled informal living area that opens onto the courtyard/garden with established trees including fragrant orange tree, bathroom with original claw-foot bathtub and separate laundry. Situated in a highly sought location with easy access to Yarra Bend Park and Ramsden Street Oval, Clifton Hill train station, Queens Parade cafes, shops and trams, Westgarth Village and excellent schools. Features include, ducted heating, air-conditioning, security system and storage shed.
Insights: 10 Kiewa Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Affordably Yours
This single fronted terrace is deceptively spacious offering enormous potential at an affordable price point for Clifton Hill.

Description:
Smartly refurbished in the heart of the Village
Moments from cafes, Clifton Hill station and parkland, this spacious, light-filled ground floor apartment is a must-see for home-buyers and investors. Set to the rear of a well-maintained older block, it comprises a generous living/dining room, large well-equipped kitchen/casual meals, two double bedrooms (BIRs), and bathroom/laundry with large shower over bath and separate WC. Including parking space, this welcoming home features polished timber floors, display shelving, storage and split-system air conditioning.
Insights: 8/96 Spensley Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Delightful Cottage In Idyllic Position
Part of a charming row of Victorian terraces in a quiet street, this immaculately presented period home boasts a contemporary touch, complete with eco-friendly focus including solar panels, a flourishing vegetable patch and water tank connected sprinkler system. Behind its elevated street presence and tessellated tile entrance, the light-filled interior comprises 3 bedrooms with BIRs including a generously proportioned main bedroom with courtyard access, formal living room adjacent to the well-appointed kitchen and dining area with light well, central bathroom and deep, private courtyard/garden with established native trees, paved entertaining area, storage shed and ROW. Enjoying an idyllic family lifestyle surrounded by parklands including Yarra Bend Park and Ramsden Street Oval at the end of the street, the home is conveniently situated close to Clifton Hill train station, Queens Parade cafes, shops and trams, Westgarth Village and many fine schools. Features include original Baltic Pine floors throughout, ducted heating, air-conditioning and an abundance of storage.
Insights: 15 Caroline Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Light, Bright & Secure
A superb first home or great addition to your investment portfolio, tucked away in a popular pocket of Clifton Hill is this immaculately presented one bedroom apartment, offering an abundance of space, light and security. Modern and bright, comprising open plan living with meals area and spacious east facing balcony. Fully equipped kitchen with SS appliances, gas cooking and dishwasher plus a tiled bathroom with combined laundry facilities. Additional features include split system heating /cooling, video intercom and security entrance, remote lock up garage and secure storage unit. Positioned close to Dights falls and minutes from Clifton Hill train station and shopping village. Potential rental approx. $375pw. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 1/3 Barries Place, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 12 other 1 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Parkside Paradise!
Perfectly located right next to scenic parklands and Merri Creek, this impressive two bedroom ground floor garden apartment delivers a spacious and comfortable living experience with two outdoor areas! In an utterly peaceful and boutique complex, youre just moments to Ramsden Street Reserve, Quarries Park, great local shops and restaurants, Clifton Hill Station and Eastern Freeway. All this minutes from the CBD!
Accommodation: Embrace the peace and quiet and amazing ground floor location of this superb offering. New laminate timber floors add a modern edge, while further enjoy an expansive lounge and dining zone opening out to a lush garden courtyard, kitchen with meals counter and quality appliances, large bathroom featuring a European laundry, and two private rear bedroom with mirrored built-in robes. Master bedroom opens onto second larger garden courtyard at the rear ideal for entertaining.
Features: Secure car space, wall heating in living zone, intercom entry, communal established gardens, resort-style pool and barbecue area.

Lovely Bones
This pretty Edwardian terrace has lovely proportions and an ideal location close to the Darling Gardens. With 2 bedrooms, lounge/dining, large kitchen meals, a bright bathroom and a secluded rear courtyard garden. Surrounded by fantastic facilities, Clifton Hill shops, a great school and with direct access to Collingwood and the CBD beyond this is an ideal inner city home.

Description:
Bohemian Rhapsody
Bohemian Rhapsody in blue, green, pink or any other colour. It’s straight and solid, somewhat faded glory, but this elevated Hawthorn brick Victorian charmer is ready for you to add your touches to complete your own dream home. So well situated in one of the citys most sought after locations close transport, Merri Creek, Yarra parklands & Darling Gardens. Comprising: arched hallway, 2 double bedrooms, separate lounge and dining, french doors leading to North West facing courtyard with potential car access via right of way. Original features throughout, baltic floors, lacework, exposed brick, feature wall, open fire places, kitchen, functional bathroom & laundry and solar panels to reduce increasing power bills.
Insights: 32 Myrtle Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Entry via Service Lane
"Narrabri" C. 1904
Set back far from the road behind a tree-lined residential lane with ample parking, this glorious tuck-pointed brick Victorian boasts an immaculately presented interior combining timeless period lustre with modern comfort. Behind its private front garden and tessellated tile entrance, you enter to an immediate sense of space and grandeur with high pressed-metal ceilings, gleaming Baltic Pine floors and generously proportioned rooms including an elegant formal living room with window seat and adjacent formal dining room, well-appointed kitchen with meals area (Rosiers industrial oven/stove, stone bench tops), three bedrooms (main with BIRs and private balcony) and renovated central bathroom with Jack Auld custom cabinetry, Perrin & Rowe fixtures, claw foot bathtub and linen press. The light-filled paved rear courtyard/garden features a newly landscaped, drought resistant garden and captivating Weeping Silver Birch tree. With Darling Gardens located at the end of the street, the home enjoys easy access to Queens Parade shopping/cafes/transport, Clifton Hill train station and excellent schools including Clifton Hill and St John's primary schools. Other features include original OFPs throughout, double glazed leadlight windows, ducted heating, air-conditioning, Euro laundry and storage shed.
Insights: 487 Hoddle Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Inner City Oasis
With warm filtered sunlight through every window, enjoying one of Clifton Hill's most highly sought-after parkland positions with this exceptional renovated 1st-floor apartment boasting enormous lifestyle appeal. Tranquil Merri Creek parks and trails at your doorstep, cafes, Queens Parade and Clifton Hill Train Station just a short stroll away. Located in the coveted 'Clifton View Apartments', first home buyers and investors will be thrilled with the wonderful inner-city lifestyle opportunity. Offers 1 double bedroom with built-in robes, large living room, bright kitchen/dining, gleaming bathroom with laundry taps, separate toilet, high ceilings, polished timber floors, heating, secure intercom entry and lock up garage with storage. Not to be missed
Photo ID Required at All Inspections
Insights: 14/14 The Esplanade, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 12 other 1 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.
